problem_names:
lemma sub_ss_equality: 
  assumes "sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>"
    and "sub_set_system \<V> \<B> \<U> \<A>"
  shows "\<U> = \<V>" and "\<A> = \<B>"
lemma sub_point_rep_number_le: "x \<in> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> \<A> rep x \<le> \<B> rep x"
lemma sub_point_index_le: "ps \<subseteq> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> \<A> index ps \<le> \<B> index ps"
lemma add_block_sub_des: "finite b \<Longrightarrow> b \<noteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> sub_design \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> b) (add_block b)"
translations:
proof (prove)
using this:
  \<U> \<subseteq> \<V>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> \<V>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<A> \<subseteq># \<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bl \<in># \<A> \<Longrightarrow> bl \<in># \<B>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. count \<A> b \<le> multiplicity b

locale sub_design = sub_incidence_system + des: design \<V> \<B>
begin

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite \<V>
  \<lbrakk>?A \<subseteq> ?B; finite ?B\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> finite ?A
  \<U> \<subseteq> \<V>
  ?A \<in># \<A> \<Longrightarrow> ?A \<noteq> {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. design \<U> \<A>

locale proper_sub_set_system = incidence_system \<V> \<B> 
  for "\<U>" and "\<A>" and "\<V>" and "\<B>" + 
  assumes points_psubset: "\<U> \<subset> \<V>"
  assumes blocks_subset: "\<A> \<subseteq># \<B>"
begin

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<U> \<subset> \<V>
  \<A> \<subseteq># \<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<A> \<subseteq># \<B>
  incidence_system \<V> \<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<U> \<noteq> \<V> \<Longrightarrow>
    proper_sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>
by (simp add: points_subset proper_sub_set_system.intro proper_sub_set_system_axioms_def psubsetI)

proof (prove)
using this:
  proper_sub_set_system ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B> \<Longrightarrow>
  incidence_system ?\<V> ?\<B>
  proper_sub_set_system ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<A> \<subseteq># ?\<B>
  \<lbrakk>?A \<subset> ?B;
   \<lbrakk>?A \<subseteq> ?B; \<not> ?B \<subseteq> ?A\<rbrakk>
   \<Longrightarrow> ?R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. proper_sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B> \<Longrightarrow>
    sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>

proof (prove)
using this:
  incidence_system ?point_set ?block_collection \<equiv>
  \<forall>b.
     b \<in># ?block_collection \<longrightarrow> b \<subseteq> ?point_set
  (?A \<subseteq> ?B) =
  (\<forall>t. t \<in> ?A \<longrightarrow> t \<in> ?B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>incidence_system \<V> \<B>; \<U> \<subseteq> \<V>;
     \<A> \<subseteq># \<B>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>

lemma sub_ss_equality: 
  assumes "sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>"
    and "sub_set_system \<V> \<B> \<U> \<A>"
  shows "\<U> = \<V>" and "\<A> = \<B>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  sub_set_system \<U> \<A> \<V> \<B>
  sub_set_system \<V> \<B> \<U> \<A>
  sub_set_system ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B> \<Longrightarrow>
  ?\<U> \<subseteq> ?\<V>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<U> = \<V> &&& \<A> = \<B>
subsubsection \<open>Reasoning on Incidence Sys property relationships\<close>
by (auto simp add: sys_block_sizes_def ins.sys_block_sizes_def blocks_subset sub_blocks)
lemma sub_point_rep_number_le: "x \<in> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> \<A> rep x \<le> \<B> rep x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> \<A> rep x \<le> \<B> rep x
by (simp add: point_replication_number_def blocks_subset multiset_filter_mono size_mset_mono)
lemma sub_point_index_le: "ps \<subseteq> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> \<A> index ps \<le> \<B> index ps"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ps \<subseteq> \<U> \<Longrightarrow> \<A> index ps \<le> \<B> index ps
by (simp add: points_index_def blocks_subset multiset_filter_mono size_mset_mono)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>b1 b2.
       \<lbrakk>b1 \<in># \<A>; b2 \<in># remove1_mset b1 \<A>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>b1a b2a.
                            b1 |\<inter>| b2 = b1a |\<inter>| b2a \<and>
                            b1a \<in># \<B> \<and>
                            b2a \<in># remove1_mset b1a \<B>

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?b \<in># multiple_blocks ?n \<Longrightarrow> ?b \<in># \<B>
  ?b \<in># \<B> \<Longrightarrow> ?b \<subseteq> \<V>
  0 < ?n \<Longrightarrow> \<B> \<subseteq># multiple_blocks ?n
  0 < n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> \<V> (multiple_blocks n)

proof (prove)
using this:
  incidence_system (add_point ?p) \<B>
  add_point ?p \<equiv> insert ?p \<V>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> (add_point p) \<B>
by (simp add: sub_ssI subset_insertI incidence_system_axioms sub_incidence_system.intro)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system (del_point p) (str_del_point_blocks p) \<V> \<B>

proof (prove)
using this:
  incidence_system (del_point ?p) (str_del_point_blocks ?p)
  \<lbrakk>?x \<notin> \<V>; ?b \<in># \<B>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?x \<notin> ?b
  del_point ?p \<equiv> \<V> - {?p}
  str_del_point_blocks ?p \<equiv> filter_mset ((\<notin>) ?p) \<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system (del_point p) (str_del_point_blocks p) \<V> \<B>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> b) (add_block b)

proof (prove)
using this:
  incidence_system (\<V> \<union> ?b) (add_block ?b)
  \<lbrakk>?x \<notin> \<V>; ?b \<in># \<B>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?x \<notin> ?b
  add_block ?b \<equiv> \<B> + {#?b#}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> b) (add_block b)

proof (prove)
using this:
  incidence_system \<V> (del_block ?b)
  del_block ?b \<subseteq># \<B>
  incidence_system ?point_set ?block_collection \<equiv>
  \<forall>b.
     b \<in># ?block_collection \<longrightarrow> b \<subseteq> ?point_set

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_incidence_system \<V> (del_block b) \<V> \<B>

proof (prove)
using this:
  design \<V> (multiple_blocks ?n)
  0 < n
  0 < ?n \<Longrightarrow>
  sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> \<V> (multiple_blocks ?n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_design \<V> \<B> \<V> (multiple_blocks n)

proof (prove)
using this:
  design (add_point ?p) \<B>
  sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> (add_point ?p) \<B>
  \<lbrakk>sub_incidence_system ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B>;
   design ?\<V> ?\<B>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> sub_design ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_design \<V> \<B> (add_point p) \<B>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_design (del_point p) (str_del_point_blocks p) \<V> \<B>

proof (prove)
using this:
  sub_incidence_system (del_point ?p) (str_del_point_blocks ?p) \<V> \<B>
  \<lbrakk>sub_incidence_system ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B>;
   design ?\<V> ?\<B>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> sub_design ?\<U> ?\<A> ?\<V> ?\<B>
  design \<V> \<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_design (del_point p) (str_del_point_blocks p) \<V> \<B>
lemma add_block_sub_des: "finite b \<Longrightarrow> b \<noteq> {} \<Longrightarrow> sub_design \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> b) (add_block b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite b; b \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> sub_design \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> b) (add_block b)

proof (prove)
using this:
  sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> ?b) (add_block ?b)
  \<lbrakk>finite ?bl; ?bl \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> design (\<V> \<union> ?bl) (add_block ?bl)
  \<lbrakk>design ?\<U> ?\<A>;
   sub_incidence_system \<V> \<B> ?\<U> ?\<A>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> sub_design \<V> \<B> ?\<U> ?\<A>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>finite b; b \<noteq> {}\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> sub_design \<V> \<B> (\<V> \<union> b) (add_block b)

proof (prove)
using this:
  design \<V> (del_block ?bl)
  sub_incidence_system \<V> (del_block ?b) \<V> \<B>
  \<lbrakk>design ?\<U> ?\<A>;
   sub_incidence_system ?\<U> ?\<A> \<V> \<B>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> sub_design ?\<U> ?\<A> \<V> \<B>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sub_design \<V> (del_block b) \<V> \<B>
